text: Mansakhet marwaan tirton khan ama tampalooi kha aleitum. Khawa phakhan macheek li meilom kha thisen le inchunna nuoipil chungnga inleita. Nuoipilchung kha semthumma semkhat, han thingkuung ngaikha semthumma semkhat kha aleikaang halli akadum leihar rakip ngaikha aleikaangjei. Suok 9:23-25; Ezek 38:22
